snippet: The United Automobile Workers has seized on leaked documents from Gov. Bill Haslam in its efforts to persuade the National Labor Relations Board to order a new unionization election at the Volkswagen plant in Chattanooga.
abstract: United Automobile Workers union is focusing on leaked documents from Tennessee Gov Bill Haslam in its efforts to persuade National Labor Relations Board to order new unionization election at Volkswagen plant in Chattanooga; union argues that Haslam and Sen Bob Corker frightened VW workers at plant with anti-union statements that made fair vote impossible.
lead_paragraph: The United Automobile Workers has seized on leaked documents from Gov. Bill Haslam in its efforts to persuade the National Labor Relations Board to order a new unionization election at the Volkswagen plant in Chattanooga.

headline.main: In Bid for Revote, Union Claims Tennessee Officials Frightened Workers
headline.print_headline: In Bid for Revote, Union Claims Tennessee Officials Frightened Workers
